org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast

Class ToastOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.AbstractBaseBuilder
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast.ToastOptionsBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsBuilder

    public final class ToastOptionsBuilder
extends AbstractBaseBuilder
    Comfortable object to create Toaster options by a builder.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
